Title: Requires health insurers to provide coverage without cost-sharing for opioid antagonists and devices
Summary: Requires health insurers to provide coverage without cost-sharing for opioid antagonists and devices; provides that no prior authorization of premedical review for coverage of such opioid antagonist is required.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurers to provide coverage without cost-sharing for opioid antagonists and devices
